i1.name: Daredevil_Impulse
description: {{sbc|Innate - Style:}} '''Samira's''' damaging [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|abilities]] against at least one enemy {{tip|champion}} different from the previous damaging hit made against champions generate a ''Style'' [[stack]] for 6 seconds, which refreshes on {{tt|subsequent|Does not have to be unique}} hits and stacks up to 6 times.
'''Samira''' gains {{as|{{pp|3.5*(x-1) for 7|0 to 6|key=%|label1=''Style'' stacks}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}|ms}}.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Samira's''' basic attacks against targets in {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 200 range use her blade, becoming {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}. Blade attacks {{tip|on-hit}}, ''{{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}'', ''{{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}}'', and the slash and explosives of ''{{ai|Flair|Samira}}'' deal {{as|{{pp|2 to 19}} {{as|(+ {{pp|3.5 to 10.5|key=%}} AD)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|0 to 100 by 10|0 to 100 by 10|key=%|key1=%|label1=target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.

'''Samira's''' basic attack against an {{tip|immobilized}} target is empowered to have an {{tip|uncancellable windup}} and deal the {{as|attack's damage}} over 6 strikes in {{fd|0.5}} seconds. If the target is a {{tip|monster}} or is {{tip|airborne}}, the attack also {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. '''Samira''' will {{tip|dash}} into her {{sti|attack range}} from the target if they are nearby, though not through terrain.

The empowered attack {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Samira's''' basic attack timer, is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers, applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects only once, and cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Style: Samira's damaging basic attacks and champion ability against at least one enemy champion different from the previous damaging hit made against champions generate a Style stack for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 6 times.
Samira gains 0 to 6 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed.
Innate: Samira's basic attacks against targets in er 200 range use her blade, becoming non-projectile. Blade attacks on-hit, Samira's Blade Whirl, Samira's Wild Rush, and the slash and explosives of Samira's Flair deal 2 − 19 (based on level) (+ 3.5% − 10.5% (based on level) AD) bonus magic damage, increased by 0 to 100 by 10 ‒ undefined.
Samira's basic attack against an immobilized target is empowered to have an uncancellable windup and deal the attack's damage over 6 strikes in 0.5 seconds. If the target is a monster or is airborne, the attack also knocks them up for 0.5 seconds. Samira will dash into her attack range from the target if they are nearby, though not through terrain.
The empowered attack resets Samira's basic attack timer, is affected by critical strike modifiers, applies on-hit effects only once, and cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* The stack count is represented by the grades [[File:Samira Rank E.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank D.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank C.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank B.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank A.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank S.png|20px|border|link=]] to the left of her [[health bar]] for '''Samira''' herself, and a stack counter underneath the bar that is visible to all players.
* The empowered attack can trigger on {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} from both ally and enemy sources.
** Self-applied or allied-applied {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} from the enemy '''will''' count for the empowered attack to trigger.{{bug|2}}
** Those applied by the ''neutral'' team (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock back) '''can''' be targeted.
** It cannot trigger against enemies knocked {{tip|airborne}} by a {{ui|Blast Cone}} triggered by anyone.{{bug|2}}
* The empowered attack's interaction with [[Crowd control#Immunity|immunities to crowd control]]:
** It ''will not'' trigger against {{tip|displacement immune}} targets. If the empowered attack had already gone off, the knock up will ''not'' be resisted, thus interrupting the target's actions.{{bug|2}}
** It ''will'' trigger against {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} targets.
*** The knock up will however be partially resisted against {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}}; only the disabling portion (airborne debuff) will be negated but not the displacement (forced movement).{{bug|2}}
*** The knock up will be resisted by {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}, but the ability does not trigger its on-{{tip|immobilize|immobilization}} effect.{{bug|2}}
* The empowered attack will not apply the knock up against {{tip|suspension|suspended}} enemies.
* The empowered attack will only apply the knock up if the target is still {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|airborne}} upon being hit. It will not apply if they are no longer disabled when hit.
* The empowered attack cannot be used against a target with a {{tip|spell shield}}.
* The application of the knock up can occur on any of the missiles of the empowered attack if it had not already occurred on the first missile.
** A missile that is parried by {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}} or is {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}}, or missed while '''Samira''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} '''cannot''' apply the knock up.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Samira''' cannot {{tip|dash}} into range to use the empowered attack. She can only use it if her target is within her {{sti|attack range}} while under this condition.
* The on-target cooldown will apply even if the empowered attack is parried.
* The empowered attack rolls {{tip|critical strike}} for each shot of the flurry.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} dealt with the blade is {{tip|default damage}}. The empowered attack is first 1 instance of {{tip|basic damage}} and then 5 instances of {{tip|default damage}}.
** The attacks do not deal the '''bonus''' damage against [[structures]].
* The empowered attack is unaffected by {{stil|attack speed}} modifiers.
* {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit'' and {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} bolts will not apply the {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, since it is {{tip|on-hit}} of specifically the melee attack casts.
* Attacks with the gun and blade do not count as different attacks for stacking ''Style''.
* Basic attacks using the blade are still classified as {{tip|ranged}}.
* The melee attack's range condition is unaffected by {{stil|attack range}} modifiers (e.g. {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}).
** Blade range is calculated edge-to-edge just like basic attack ranges are, hence both '''Samira''' gaining bonus [[size]] or her target increases the total distance at which '''Samira''' can attack them with the blade.
* Since the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} requires an exterior source to {{tip|immobilize}} the enemy, {{ri|Aftershock}} will be swapped with {{ri|Grasp of the Undying}} for '''Samira''' at the start of the game.
* Since {{ais|R|Samira}} cooldown is static, {{ri|Ultimate Hunter}} will be swapped with {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} for '''Samira''' at the start of the game.
* Abilities blocked by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} will still grant '''Samira''' ''Style'' stacks.
* '''Samira''' still gains ''Style'' stacks from damaging attacks and abilities landed against {{tip|clone|clones}}.

q1.name: Flair
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' fires a shot in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit.
If a targetable enemy is in front of '''Samira''' at the time of cast, she will instead slash with her blade in a cone, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.

Casting ''Flair'' during'' {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}}'' will deploy explosives in her wake that detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies hit. This can be done while performing ''{{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}'' or ''{{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}}'' despite ''Flair'' being disabled during them.{{bug|2}}
''Flair'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|25|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and will {{tip|applies lifesteal|apply}} {{stil|life steal}} at {{fd|66.6}}% effectiveness.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira fires a shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.
If a targetable enemy is in front of Samira at the time of cast, she will instead slash with her blade in a cone, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.
Casting Flair during Samira's Wild Rush will deploy explosives in her wake that detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies hit. This can be done while performing Samira's Blade Whirl or Samira's Inferno Trigger despite Flair being disabled during them.Unknown value: bug / 2
Flair can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage and will apply Unknown value: stil / life steal at 66.6% effectiveness.
q1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the shot and {{tip|area damage}} on the slash and explosives.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will always benefit from the damage dealt at {{fd|66.6}}% effectiveness and does not take into account of the ability's [[spell effects]], whereas on the other hand for {{tip|omnivamp}} does, and it will modify the {{tip|healing}} accordingly.
* The slash and explosives roll their {{tip|critical strike}} against each target individually.
* The shot and the slash do not count as different abilities for stacking {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}}.
* '''Samira's''' next attack after using ''Flair'' will occasionally come out faster.{{bug|2}}
* '''Samira''' can use {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} during ''Flair's'' cast time.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** ''Flair'' will fire or slash from wherever '''Samira''' is at the end of the cast time.
*** '''Samira''' will always slash in her facing direction, and she will turn to face the target direction only once at the start of the cast time.
* ''Flair'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* Only the shot will be destroyed by {{tip|projectile|projectile-intercepting}} effects.
* The explosive placement is illustrated in {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} regardless of whether ''Flair'' is available.
** The VFX always covers the the full dash's distance even if {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} is interrupted mid-dash.

w1.name: Blade_Whirl
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' spins her blade over {{fd|0.75}} seconds, destroying hostile non-{{tip|turret}} {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} within the area for the duration.
'''Samira''' slashes twice during ''Blade Whirl'', each one dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies. The first slash occurs immediately and the second one occurs after the duration.
'''''Samira''' cannot attack nor cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} during Blade Whirl. Casting {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} will end Blade Whirl early.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira spins her blade over 0.75 seconds, destroying hostile non-turret projectiles within the area for the duration.
Samira slashes twice during Blade Whirl, each one dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies. The first slash occurs immediately and the second one occurs after the duration.
Samira cannot attack nor cast Samira's Flair during Blade Whirl. Casting Samira's Inferno Trigger will end Blade Whirl early.
leveling: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 80*2}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage from one slash.
* While the ability has a cast time - the cast time has no effect on the ability's usability. All effects begin immediately and '''Samira''' can move throughout. 
* ''Blade Whirl'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* Both slashes count as the same ability for stacking {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}}.
* The effect ending early includes the second slash not being performed, if applicable.  
* Entering {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} will also end ''Blade Whirl'' early.
** Other item actives and channeling {{si|Teleport}} or {{si|Recall}} will ''not'' end the effect early.
* '''Samira''' can ignore the lockout for {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and basic attacks if she uses {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} and queues up {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and/or a basic attack at the start of it.{{bug}}

effects.str:
• Slash Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 160% bonus AD)

e1.name: Wild_Rush
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the direction of the target enemy or enemy {{tip|turret|structure}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies she passes through. She also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy {{tip|champion}} within 3 seconds of damaging them {{sti|cdr|resets}} ''Wild Rush's'' cooldown.
'''''Samira''' can cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} or {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} during Wild Rush. Using {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} will buffer it to cast at the end of the dash.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira dashes in the direction of the target enemy or enemy structure, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through. She also gains bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets Wild Rush's cooldown.
Samira can cast Samira's Flair or Samira's Inferno Trigger during Wild Rush. Using Samira's Blade Whirl will buffer it to cast at the end of the dash.
e1.notes:
* '''Samira''' gains the attack speed buff at the start of the dash, and it lasts for 3 seconds from that point on.
* ''Wild Rush'' does not deal its damage to turrets.
* ''Wild Rush'' prioritizes targeting champions over turrets.
* ''Wild Rush'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} will be buffered to cast at the end of the dash if {{ai|Flair|Samira}} was cast during the dash.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Wild Rush'' will interrupt the dash but deal damage to nearby enemies at the location.
** If {{ai|Flair|Samira}} was cast during this time, an explosive will also be placed at that location.
* ''Wild Rush'' will also reset if '''Samira''' kills or gets assist credit on a {{tip|clone}} that dies (to hostiles).{{bug|2}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD)
  • Attack Speed: %

r1.name: Inferno_Trigger
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' unleashes a torrent of shots for {{rutngt|2.25}}, '''reducing''' her {{as|movement speed}} by {{as|30%|ms}} and rapidly shooting at  nearby enemies over {{rutngt|2}} at sporadic times in {{tt|{{fd|0.2}}-second intervals|on average; total of 5 intervals of 0.231 and 5 of 0.198 seconds}} each, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each shot, reduced by 75% against {{tip|minions}}.
Each shot can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at {{fd|66.6}}% effectiveness.

''A nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be shot at. {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style|image= Samira Rank S.png}} stacks are consumed at the end of the effect.''

'''''Samira''' cannot attack nor cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} during Inferno Trigger, but she can still move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}} as well as {{tip|disarm}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots for 2.277, reducing her movement speed by 30% and rapidly shooting at nearby enemies over 2.013 at sporadic times in 0.2-second intervals each, dealing physical damage with each shot, reduced by 75% against minions.
Each shot can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage and applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 66.6% effectiveness.
A nearby visible enemy is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be shot at. Samira's Style stacks are consumed at the end of the effect.
Samira cannot attack nor cast Samira's Flair and Samira's Blade Whirl during Inferno Trigger, but she can still move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of cast-inhibiting crowd control as well as disarm.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Shot|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Target|{{ap|5*10 to 25*10}} {{as|(+ 500% AD)}}|Minion Damage Per Shot|{{ap|5*0.25 to 25*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25}}% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Minion|{{ap|5*0.25*10 to 25*0.25*10}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25*10}}% AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* '''Samira's''' facing direction remains as it had been or, if she is moving, towards that direction during ''Inferno Trigger''.
* The {{stil|movement speed}} reduction stacks additively with other {{as|movement speed}} bonuses. 
** It is a negative bonus, not a {{tip|slow}}, and is thus not reduced by {{tip|slow resist}}.
* ''Inferno Trigger's'' area of effect is fixed around '''Samira'''.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage of one shot.
* ''Inferno Trigger'' will not end if there are no enemies that remain in range.
* ''Inferno Trigger'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it becomes unsealed or off cooldown.
* The bottom of the [[Summoner|player's]] screen will have a fiery visual effect while '''Samira''' is at ''S'' rank and ''Inferno Trigger'' has at least one rank.
* {{iis|Galeforce}} ''Cloudburst'' can be used during ''Inferno Trigger'', but {{iis|Prowler's Claw}} ''Sandswipe'' can't.
r1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  6 as 6 and riot's value 0,0,0 as 0
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '5,5,5' as '5'
